text: Country blues (also folk blues, rural blues, backwoods blues, or downhome blues) is all the acoustic, guitar forms of the blues. ==Important country blues musicians== *Etta Baker *Robert Lowery *Blind Blake *Son House *Bo Carter *Charley Patton *Tommy Johnson *Robert Johnson *Blind Lemon Jefferson *Blind Willie Johnson *Blind Willie McTell *Sleepy John Estes *Fred McDowell *Robert Pete Williams *Skip James *Bukka White *Barbecue Bob *Koko Taylor *Mississippi John Hurt *John Lee Hooker *Muddy Waters *Charles David Sharp *Elizabeth Cotten *Reverend Gary Davis *Charlie McCoy *Chaz Van Gogh *Jaybird Coleman *Furry Lewis *Big Bill Broonzy *Blind Boy Fuller *Brownie McGhee *Robert Belfour *King Solomon Hill *Peetie Wheatstraw *Peps Persson *Josh White *R. L. Burnside *Lightnin' Hopkins *Little Walter *Mance Lipscomb Category:Blues music
title: Country blues
